author: rwinston
msg: Add DigestUtils and Hex from commons-codec

author: rwinston
msg: Added support for  UUID generation as specified in the latest UUID draft (http://www.ietf.org/internet-drafts/draft-mealling-uuid-urn-04.txt). The only difference is support for SHA-1 encoding when generating UUIDs from a name and namespace.

author: treilly
msg: Remove hex char validation since included w codec 1.3

author: treilly
msg: Add testNameUUIDFromString(String name, UUID namespaceUUID) method.
